CustomField.formula: CASE(Visit_Status__c, "Step 1 Approved", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm32.png", "Approved"), "Step 1 Rejected", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error32.png", "Rejected"), "Step 1 Approval Pending", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning32.png", "Pending"), "Step 2 Approved", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm32.png", "Approved"), "Step 2 Rejected", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error32.png", "Rejected"), "Step 2 Approval Pending", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning32.png", "Pending"), "")
CustomField.label: Approval Status
